me.zirko.model

Class CalculatorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • me.zirko.model.CalculatorModel

  • public class CalculatorModel
extends java.util.Observable
    CalculatorModel is the model that interacts with the user data sent by CalculatorController.

    The class compute all the data user (operations, numbers, etc...) When the model is completely update, it notify all the Observer with Observable.notifyObservers(Object) with mResult

    It implements Observable interface because of the MVC and Observer/Observable design patter between the model and the view CalculatorView

    Since:
    1.0
